name: Mursoli
culture_notes: Riveric dialect with Coastal Tongue loanwords
launching rites tied to tide and ancestors
diet heavy on smoked fish and sea plants
constraints: ritual magic consumes scarce imported reagents
long-range mind influence is banned locally
limited combustion industry; no high-pressure steam tech
notes: at mouth of a silting river; pilots rely on navigational auguries
jurisdiction muddled between inland and coastal authorities
